gen:link.msg:message: `CapitalisedProductionCosts` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Functioneel`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA5_IncomeStatementClassificationType')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA5_IncomeStatementClassificationType return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA5_CapitalisedProductionCosts')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA5_CapitalisedProductionCosts return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`EmployeeBenefitsExpenses` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Functioneel`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA1_IncomeStatementClassificationType')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA1_IncomeStatementClassificationType return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA1_EmployeeBenefitsExpenses')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA1_EmployeeBenefitsExpenses return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`GeneralAdministrativeExpenses` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Categoriaal`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA3_IncomeStatementClassificationType')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA3_IncomeStatementClassificationType return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA3_GeneralAdministrativeExpenses')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA3_GeneralAdministrativeExpenses return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`GrossOperatingResult` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Categoriaal`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA13_IncomeStatementClassificationType')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA13_IncomeStatementClassificationType return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA13_GrossOperatingResult')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA13_GrossOperatingResult return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`GrossOperatingResult` SHOULD be equal to + `NetRevenue` - `CostOfSales` + `ChangeValueAgriculturalStocks`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST103Variables1_GrossOperatingResult')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST103Variables1_GrossOperatingResult return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST103Variables1_NetRevenue')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST103Variables1_NetRevenue return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST103Variables1_CostOfSales')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST103Variables1_CostOfSales return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST103Variables1_ChangeValueAgriculturalStocks')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST103Variables1_ChangeValueAgriculturalStocks return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ImpairmentCurrentAssets` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Functioneel`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA11_IncomeStatementClassificationType')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA11_IncomeStatementClassificationType return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA11_ImpairmentCurrentAssets')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA11_ImpairmentCurrentAssets return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetOperatingResult` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Categoriaal`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA15_IncomeStatementClassificationType')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA15_IncomeStatementClassificationType return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA15_NetOperatingResult')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA15_NetOperatingResult return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetOperatingResult` SHOULD be equal to + `GrossOperatingResult` - `SumOfExpenses`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST102Variables1_NetOperatingResult')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST102Variables1_NetOperatingResult return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST102Variables1_GrossOperatingResult')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST102Variables1_GrossOperatingResult return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST102Variables1_SumOfExpenses')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST102Variables1_SumOfExpenses return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetResultAfterTax` (at the end of / during the current period) SHOULD be reported, because `ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest` (at the end of / during the previous period) and `ResultAfterTax` (at the end of / during the current period) are reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set01ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set01ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set02ResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set02ResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set03NetResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set03NetResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetResultAfterTax` (at the end of / during the previous period) SHOULD be reported, because `ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest` (at the end of / during the current period) and `ResultAfterTax` (at the end of / during the previous period) are reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set01ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set01ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set02ResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set02ResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set03NetResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set03NetResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetResultAfterTax` SHOULD be equal to + `ResultAfterTax` - `ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST102Variables2_NetResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST102Variables2_NetResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST102Variables2_ResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST102Variables2_ResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST102Variables2_ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST102Variables2_ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetResultAfterTax` SHOULD exist at least once within the same context, because `ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST1ExistenceThnExistenceCovU1_ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST1ExistenceThnExistenceCovU1_ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetResultAfterTax` SHOULD exist at least once, because the reported value of `DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup` is equal to `Geconsolideerd en enkelvoudig`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnExistenceCovPU1_DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnExistenceCovPU1_DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetResultAfterTax` SHOULD exist at least once, because the reported value of `DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup` is equal to `Geconsolideerd en enkelvoudig`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnExistenceCovPU2_DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnExistenceCovPU2_DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetResultAfterTax` SHOULD exist at least once, because the reported value of `DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup` is equal to `Geconsolideerd`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnExistenceCovPU3_DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnExistenceCovPU3_DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetResultAfterTax` SHOULD exist at least once, because the reported value of `DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup` is equal to `Geconsolideerd`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnExistenceCovPU4_DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnExistenceCovPU4_DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
`NetRevenue` SHOULD exist at least once.

`OperatingExpensesOther` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Functioneel`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA12_IncomeStatementClassificationType')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA12_IncomeStatementClassificationType return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA12_OperatingExpensesOther')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA12_OperatingExpensesOther return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`OperatingExpenses` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `IncomeStatementClassificationType` is equal to `Functioneel`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA4_IncomeStatementClassificationType')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA4_IncomeStatementClassificationType return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA4_OperatingExpenses')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA4_OperatingExpenses return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`OperatingExpenses` SHOULD be equal to + `CostsRawMaterialsConsumables` + `CostsOutsourcedWorkOtherExternalExpenses` + `EmployeeBenefitsExpenses` + `DepreciationPropertyPlantEquipmentAmortisationIntangibleAssets` - `ChangesInValueIntangibleAssetsPropertyPlantEquipment` - `ChangesValueInvestmentProperties` + `ImpairmentCurrentAssets` + `OperatingExpensesOther` - `UnrealisedChangesInValueOfInvestments` - `RealisedChangesInValueOfInvestments`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST110Variables1_OperatingExpenses')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST110Variables1_OperatingExpenses return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST110Variables1_CostsRawMaterialsConsumables')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementLarge_PrtFST110Variables1_CostsRawMaterialsConsumables return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"',
